usa: Explorer 1: The first U.S. satellite was launched into space.[307]
The National Aeronautics and Space Act was signed into law; establishing the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.<sup id="cite_ref-308" class="reference">[308]</sup>
Jack Kilby invented the integrated circuit.<sup id="cite_ref-309" class="reference">[309]</sup>
The National Defense Education Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-310" class="reference">[310]</sup>
